Here is the list of signs in the $LINE system, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 7/10 - Strong sense of independence, but can be impulsive.
2. Taurus - 8/10 - Reliable and practical, but can be stubborn.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Curious and adaptable, but can be restless.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotional and nurturing, but can be overly sensitive.
5. Leo - 7/10 - Confident and charismatic, but can be prideful.
6. Virgo - 8/10 - Analytical and hardworking, but can be perfectionistic.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, but can be indecisive.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate and intense, but can be secretive.
9. Sagittarius - 7/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, but can be blunt.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Ambitious and responsible, but can be serious.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, but can be unconventional.
12. Pisces - 5/10 - Imaginative and empathetic, but can be dreamy.
Note: The scores are subjective and based on general interpretations of the signs' traits and characteristics.
